{{cpp/chrono/day/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=1|1=
constexpr std::chrono::day&amp; operator+=( const std::chrono::days&amp; d ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=2|1=
constexpr std::chrono::day&amp; operator-=( const std::chrono::days&amp; d ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Adds or subtracts {{c|d.count()}} days from the day value.
@1@ Equivalent to {{c|1=*this = *this + d;}}.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|1=*this = *this - d;}}.

===Return value===
A reference to this {{tt|day}} after modification.

===Notes===
If the result would be outside the range {{closed range|0|255}}, the actual stored value is unspecified.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cassert&gt;
#include &lt;chrono&gt;

int main()
{
    std::chrono::day d{15};

    d += std::chrono::days(2);
    assert(d == std::chrono::day(17));

    d -= std::chrono::days{3};
    assert(d == std::chrono::day(14));
}
}}
